commonBlocks.text:
Marstons have been building around London and the home counties since 1895 but now our focus is strictly within South West London.

Our main requirements are:

  1. Residential, commercial, industrial or mixed use development opportunities
  2. Sites with or without planning
  3. Existing investments with development potential
  4. Complex, messy sites considered
  5. Land value up to Â£5m per site
  6. Sites with potential for 3 - 20 units
  7. Strategic opportunities
  8. Sites to develop and sell or hold as long term investments

We have ongoing requirements for sites, so for further information or if you have a site that could be of interest, please contact:

Christian Kortlang, Land Buyer

Email: Christian.Kortlang@marstonproperties.co.uk
Phone: 020 3010 1946
Mobile: 07769 218 209

site.enquiryText: Interested in this property? Our team of dedicated industry experts is here to help you. Fill out the form below or call 020 7736 7133 to get in touch.
